item.title: OS X Engineer
item.description: You write efficient, elegant, and testable Objective-C and Swift to a high standard, in a timely and scalable way. You’re familiar with CoreData, AFNetworking, File System Events, XPC Services, Background/Login Applications, Status Bar Items, Spotlight Integrations, Local and Remote Notifications, App Sandbox, and Accessibility requirements. Intimate familiarity with the latest design guidelines for OSX is highly desirable.
